nhc_headline: ...MILTON EXPLOSIVELY INTENSIFIES WITH 175-MPH WINDS... ...RESIDENTS IN FLORIDA ARE URGED TO FOLLOW THE ADVICE OF LOCAL  OFFICIALS...
summary:
...MILTON EXPLOSIVELY INTENSIFIES WITH 175-MPH WINDS... ...RESIDENTS IN FLORIDA ARE URGED TO FOLLOW THE ADVICE OF LOCAL  OFFICIALS...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Mon Oct 7
 the center of Milton was located near 21.7, -91.3
 with movement E at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 911 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 175 mph.
